item.title: Wave functions and k-point functions for the AKNS hierarchy
item.description: arXiv:2601.18211v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: For an arbitrary solution to the AKNS hierarchy, the logarithmic derivatives of the tau-function of the solution can be computed by the matrix-resolvent method [14,21]. In this paper, we introduce a pair of wave functions of the solution and we use them to express the corresponding matrix resolvent. Based on this, we derive a new formula for the k-point correlation function of the AKNS hierarchy expressed in terms of wave functions. As an application, we show that the tau-function of an arbitrary solution to the AKNS hierarchy is a KP tau-function.
